markdownRemark.html:
Answer: This is one of those questions where the trick is to come up with an easier answer than the one that's seemingly being called for. We'd say. "$10 per window."

Read more: http://www.businessinsider.com/answers-to-15-google-interview-questions-that-will-make-you-feel-stupid-2009-11?op=1#ixzz2sHZ1xu9U

frontmatter.title: How much should you charge to wash all the windows in Seattle?
